Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits correctional facilities from denying entry to certain peer support advocates based on such advocates' prior history of incarceration
Summary: Prohibits correctional facilities from denying entry to peer support advocates who are certified or licensed and are participating in the provision of corrections-based substance use disorder treatment and transition services based on such advocates' prior history of incarceration.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to prohibiting correctional facilities from blocking entry to peer support advocates based on such advocates' prior history of incarceration
